item.description: One of our members had the idea to meet for a pique-nique at the Saturday jazz concert in Bushnell Park. Bring a picnic, a chair, and a sweater. The meeting place will be right next to the big fountain in Bushnell Park just east of the stage. There could be thousands of people there so please look carerfully near the fountain for people speaking French! If you have any trouble finding them, Mait√© will be volunteering at the T-shirt sale tent, so you can go there and ask for her. Rain would cancel this event.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: festivale de jazz
